org.eclipse.jst.ws.jaxws.dom.runtime.persistence
Class JaxWsDefaultsCalculator

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.jst.ws.jaxws.dom.runtime.persistence.JaxWsDefaultsCalculator

public class JaxWsDefaultsCalculator
extends java.lang.Object

Contains utility methods for calculating default values of some attributes/properties in annotations and DOM objects.

Author:
Georgi Vachkov

defineSBStyle

public SOAPBindingStyle defineSBStyle(IAnnotation<? extends org.eclipse.jdt.core.IJavaElement> sbAnnotation)
Defines the SOAPBindingStyle. If there is a value for style attribute in sbAnnotation returns that value otherwise returns the default value for this attribute.

Parameters:
sbAnnotation -
Returns:
the style

defineSBUse

public SOAPBindingUse defineSBUse(IAnnotation<? extends org.eclipse.jdt.core.IJavaElement> sbAnnotation)
Defines the SOAPBindingUse. If there is a value for use attribute in sbAnnotation returns that value otherwise returns the default value for this attribute.

Returns:
the style

Defines the default operation parameter name according to JSR-181 point 4.4 - WebParam name attribute

getDefaultParamInHedaer
